replies.replyComment: tharunayan amu amuwe marapu ranilta, fonsekata ada lamai ne. Premadasa paramparawath othanin iwarai. Premadasath kochchara jivitha marala dammada. Ranilge paramparawath othanin iwarai.

@Rita Srilanka oyalage ranasinghe premadasa meruwe pabakaran. Mahinda mahaththaya prabakaramwa meruwa. Eth sajithta ewa mathaka ne. Fonseka ada oya thathweta awe gotabaya nisa. Ranil fonseka mahinda mahaththayala ekama nedeyo thamai. Ranilata fansekalata oni balayata enna witharai. Dittadammawedaniya karma pala deine. Ethakota balagena inna. Hirunika ada manthri kenek une mahinda nisa.  Appachchi kiyagena e kale mahinda mahaththayath ekka ekata weda kale. Namalge kare ellenna beri unu tharahata thamai eya waira karanne. pakshe maru kale. Eyage thaththa baratha lakshman premachandra meruwe unp paharayo pirisak. Oya monada danne ane. Oyala kauruhari kiyana kata katha ahagena innawa. Baratha lakshman premachandra. hoda manussayek. hena usa mahathai. Gathi guna hoda manussayek. Me hirunika wage wachaala ne. Ape thaththige hodama yaluwek.eya mahinda mahathththayath ekka hitiye. Eyala ekata innawa unp unta balagena inna beri una. Kudu lankawata genawe eya. Podi kollonta kudu dila karapu vinase thamai eyata patisan dunne. Hirunika methanath eyage thaththawa market karanawa.
